org.HdrHistogram
Class SkinnyHistogram

java.lang.Object
  org.HdrHistogram.EncodableHistogram
      org.HdrHistogram.AbstractHistogram
          org.HdrHistogram.Histogram
              org.HdrHistogram.SkinnyHistogram
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class SkinnyHistogram
extends Histogram

This is a Java port of the Scala SkinnyHistogram encdoding logic from the Khronus project on github. The port only covers the encoding side, since it is (currently) mainly used to gauage the compression volume (and not for correctness). It includes ZigZag putLong and putInt implementations to avoid dependencies on other libs (including HdrHistogram), so that benchmarking against older versions will be possible.

See Also:
Serialized Form
